mapper.insert: insert into eventBoard(event_no, event_title, event_writer, event_content, event_date, event_hits, event_image_FileName) values(null, #{event_title}, #{event_writer}, #{event_content}, #{event_date}, 0, #{event_image_FileName})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM eventBoard ORDER BY event_date DESC) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
